page.title: 07INDUSTRY in WADESMILL cont.
page.content: Youth Training Scheme has been employed from time to time but this has not been found satisfactory. Some have been keen on the job but others less so and this has left a feeling against further involvement. The recovery side of the business is run by Mr D Flack. He has three breakdown lorries capable of pulling loads of either 48tonnes,38tonnes or 68 tonnes. In the case of a breakdown the lorry concerned either contacts the company directly or one of the main organisations who in turn send the nearest company to the vehicle. This company was on the lists of Octogan Recovery and the National Breakdown Commercial Recovery Ltd. All the team take part in courses run to show the latest techniques in vehicle recovery. They are well trained for what is sometimes dangerous work.
